description.zh-cn: 中国清朝武官，本籍福建厦门。曾任台湾镇总兵，在1862年的戴潮春事件中的斗六门战役殉职。
description.en: A military official of the Qing Dynasty from Xiamen, Fujian. He served as the Taiwan Town General and was killed in the Battle of Douliumen during the Dai Chaochun Incident in 1862.

description.zh-cn: 中国最后一个帝制王朝，林向荣为其武官。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty of China, for which Lin Xiangrong served as a military official.

description.zh-cn: 林向荣的本籍地。
description.en: The native place of Lin Xiangrong.

description.zh-cn: 清朝官员，林向荣的前任台湾镇总兵。
description.en: A Qing dynasty official, the predecessor of Lin Xiangrong as Taiwan Town General.

description.zh-cn: 台湾清治时期受台湾道制约的台湾地区最高军事首长职位。
description.en: The position of the highest military commander in the Taiwan region during the Qing rule, supervised by the Taiwan Circuit.

description.zh-cn: 清朝时期制约台湾镇总兵的机构。
description.en: An administrative body that supervised the Taiwan Town General during the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 发生于1862年的台湾民变事件，林向荣在此事件中殉职。
description.en: A rebellion in Taiwan that occurred in 1862, during which Lin Xiangrong was killed.

description.zh-cn: 戴潮春事件中的一场战役，导致林向荣殉职。
description.en: A battle during the Dai Chaochun Incident that resulted in the death of Lin Xiangrong.

description.zh-cn: 林向荣的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Lin Xiangrong.

description.zh-cn: 林向荣的长子。
description.en: The eldest son of Lin Xiangrong.

description.zh-cn: 林向荣的族弟。
description.en: A younger male cousin of Lin Xiangrong from the same clan.

description.zh-cn: 清朝官员，林向荣的继任台湾镇总兵。
description.en: A Qing dynasty official, the successor of Lin Xiangrong as Taiwan Town General.

description.zh-cn: 林向荣为中国清朝武官官员。
description.en: Lin Xiangrong was a military official of the Qing Dynasty in China.

description.zh-cn: 林向荣本籍福建厦门。
description.en: Lin Xiangrong's native place was Xiamen, Fujian.

description.zh-cn: 1857年奉旨接任台湾镇总兵，直至1862年殉职。
description.en: In 1857, he was appointed as the Taiwan Town General by imperial decree and held the position until his death in 1862.

description.zh-cn: 在台湾清治时期，台湾镇总兵受台湾道制约。
description.en: During the period of Qing rule in Taiwan, the Taiwan Town General was supervised by the Taiwan Circuit.

description.zh-cn: 1862年，林向荣于戴潮春事件中的斗六门战役殉职。
description.en: In 1862, Lin Xiangrong was killed in the Battle of Douliumen during the Dai Chaochun Incident.

description.zh-cn: 吴在任是林向荣的妻子。
description.en: Wu Zairen was the wife of Lin Xiangrong.

description.zh-cn: 林张成是林向荣的长子。
description.en: Lin Zhangcheng was the eldest son of Lin Xiangrong.

description.zh-cn: 林向皋是林向荣的族弟。
description.en: Lin Xianggao was a younger male cousin of Lin Xiangrong from the same clan.

description.zh-cn: 1857年，林向荣奉旨接替邵连科担任台湾镇总兵。
description.en: In 1857, Lin Xiangrong was appointed by imperial decree to succeed Shao Lianke as the Taiwan Town General.

description.zh-cn: 1862年林向荣殉职后，由曾元福接任台湾镇总兵。
description.en: After Lin Xiangrong's death in 1862, Zeng Yuanfu succeeded him as the Taiwan Town General.
